lines.text:
[at the end of the opening theme]
The Banana Splits presents... The Banana Splits!
In-laws can give ya trouble, and outlaws can give ya trouble! So why take a chance on by-laws!
Ya know somethin'? Someday I'm gonna roll these Bananas into a basketball and bounce 'em the heck outta here!
The Banana Splits club will now come to order. And the first business is, where's my gavel?
My gavel. Gav-el! It should be here on my desk.
Oh that. Well ya see, one week you hit your finger with it and another time you broke your desk with it, so we thought we'd better hide it.
